mosinstall.name: Tag Clouds
mosinstall.author: Alexander Hadj Hassine
mosinstall.description:
Dunia Marine Internusa

Functions

- Generates own tag clouds from Joomla website content
- Sef url support
- Stopword filter
- Module class suffix
- Many format options
- Valid XHTML

Changelog 2.0.3

- Block of special ids possible
- Max. count of tags function(THX M. Drobny)
- Special char fix
- Fontsize fix
- Subfolder fix
- Dbprefix fix
- Add title
